meanings.definition: The location where the main offices of an organization are situated.
meanings.sent1: Our company's headquarter is in the city center.
meanings.sent2: The headquarter of the business is where all the important decisions are made.
meanings.sent3: The headquarter of the company is like the heart of a body, pumping out instructions to all the other parts.
meanings.sent4: The headquarter stands tall like a beacon, guiding the rest of the organization.
meanings.sent5: Visiting the headquarter felt like stepping into the nerve center of the entire operation.

meanings.definition: To establish the main offices of an organization in a particular place.
meanings.sent1: The company decided to headquarter its operations in the bustling metropolis.
meanings.sent2: They chose to headquarter their business in a strategic location for better accessibility.
meanings.sent3: It's time to headquarter our new venture in the heart of the city!
meanings.sent4: She wanted to headquarter her startup in a place with a vibrant entrepreneurial community.
meanings.sent5: The decision to headquarter the organization here was met with enthusiasm from the team.
